sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./CityMainInfo.css"; import CurrentDate from "./CurrentDate"; import ClearSky from "./images/1.clear_sky.png"; import NightClearSky from "./images/1n.clear_sky.png"; import FewClouds from "./images/2.few_clouds.png"; import NightFewClouds from "./images/2n.few_clouds.png"; import Clouds from "./images/3.4.clouds.png"; export default function CityMainInfo(props) { let apiIcon = props.searchResults.weather[0].icon; let iconObject = { "01d": ClearSky, "01n": NightClearSky, "02d": FewClouds, "02n": NightFewClouds, "03d": Clouds, "03n": Clouds, "04d": Clouds, "04n": Clouds, "09d": "./images/09.10.rain.png", "09n": "./images/09.10.rain.png", "10d": "./images/09.10.rain.png", "10n": "./images/09.10.rain.png", "11d": "./images/11.thunderstorm.png", "11n": "./images/11.thunderstorm.png", "13d": "./images/13.snow.png", "13n": "./images/13.snow.png", "50d": "./images/50.mist.png", "50n": "./images/50n.mist.png", }; return (

{props.searchResults.name}

{Math.round(props.searchResults.main.temp)} °C
Clouds

  • Humidity: {props.searchResults.main.humidity}%
  • Wind: {Math.round(props.searchResults.wind.speed)} m/s
  • Feels like: {" "} {Math.round(props.searchResults.main.feels_like)} °C
); }
